UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Novel Synthetic Peptides Derived from Indolicidin and Ranalexin against Streptococcus pneumoniae
Literature.Author: Jindal HM, Le CF, Mohd Yusof MY, Velayuthan RD, Lee VS, Zain SM, Isa DM, Sekaran SD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=250µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>250µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 15308(MIC=>250µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>250µg/ml),Citrobacter sp.(MIC=>250µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>250µg/ml)
